sentences.sContent: Christine squirmed uncomfortably in her chair.
sentences.sCn: 克里斯蒂娜坐在椅子上不自在地扭来扭去。

sentences.sContent: The boy tried to squirm free.

trans.tranOther: to twist your body from side to side because you are uncomfortable or nervous, or to get free from something which is holding you
